MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY1 postcode area of Kirkcaldy, affecting properties in Randolph Place and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.17am. Our engineers have arrived at Food Securities substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.10am on Tuesday 16th February 2021
